title: Lamb shanks in red wine sauce
ingredients: ['4 lamb shanks', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 sticks of celery, diced', '1 onion, diced', '1 carrot, sliced', '2 mushrooms, sliced', '1 bay leaf', '1 heaped tablespoon dark brown sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '100ml red wine', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 beef stock cube - dissolved in 150ml hot water', '1 tablespoon cornflour']
